document_data.mainbody:
he Pole was a prison located in the city of Almorel on the Lake of Mists in the Hordelands in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
The Pole was located in the eastern section of Almorel adjacent to the Dwarven Mir.
In addition to housing Almorels convicted criminals who werent executed at the Hanging Place, the Pole served a ground where duels were settled.
